Video Audio Booster: Boost The Volume Of Videos On The Internet Up To 10x

The Problem: Low Audio Levels

Not all videos on the internet are created equal. While some offer crystal-clear audio quality, others may have low volume levels that make it difficult to hear and understand the content. This can be especially frustrating when watching educational videos, online courses, or entertainment content, as it hampers the overall viewing experience.

The Solution: Video Audio Booster

 This extension transforms your video-watching journey by amplifying the audio volume up to 1000% (10x) of the original volume, ensuring you never miss a beat.

How Does It Work?

Using the Video Audio Booster is incredibly straightforward, with just two simple steps:

Step 1: Install the Extension

Just click on the “Add to Chrome” button to install the extension on your browser available on this page. That's it! The extension will be added to your browser.

Step 2: Boost the Audio

Once installed, click on the extension icon whenever you are watching a video. A pop-up menu will appear, displaying a range of volume levels from 100% to 1000%. Select your desired volume level, and instantly experience enhanced audio quality.

Supported Platforms


Video Audio Booster is designed to be universally compatible with virtually all video platforms across the web. Tested and works seamlessly on major video platforms like youtube, netflix and educational sites like Coursera, Udemy.
Hopefully, this extension will help you enjoy your favorite videos with amplified audio quality.
